title: Topic 001 Question 073
body: You develop a solution that uses a Power BI Premium capacity. The capacity contains a dataset that is expected to consume 50 GB of memory.
Which two actions should you perform to ensure that you can publish the model successfully to the Power BI service? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Publish an initial dataset that is less than 10 GB.
Increase the Max Offline Dataset Size setting.
Invoke a refresh to load historical data based on the incremental refresh policy.
